biotools.summary: Given a set of peaks from (biological or technical) replicates, this tool combines the p-values of overlapping enriched regions: users can choose a threshold on the combined significance of overlapping peaks and set a minimum number of replicates where the overlapping peaks should be present.

bioschemas.name: MSPC
bioschemas.summary: Given a set of peaks from (biological or technical) replicates, this tool combines the p-values of overlapping enriched regions: users can choose a threshold on the combined significance of overlapping peaks and set a minimum number of replicates where the overlapping peaks should be present.
